forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 14 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 13 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
The evening in Downtown San Francisco drapes itself in a gentle veil of partly cloudy skies, a soft reminder of the myriad moods the city can conjure. With temperatures settling comfortably around fifty-four, a cool west-southwest breeze dances through the streets, invigorating but not harsh, inviting those out for a late stroll or a quiet dinner to wrap themselves in a light jacket or a cozy sweater. The persistent winds, gusting up to twenty-nine miles per hour, weave a symphony of rustling leaves around neighborhoods, hinting at the spirited nature of this coastal gem.

As we look forward to tomorrow, the forecast holds the promise of sunshine breaking through, with highs nearing sixty-five before the afternoon ushers in a gentle cool-down. It will be a day marked by clarity—ideal for an outdoor adventure. Picture this: a leisurely wander down to the waterfront, perhaps to revel in a simple café break, or explore the eclectic boutiques lining the streets. It’s a time when the fog recedes, unveiling the majestic silhouettes of the Golden Gate Bridge framed against a blue sky, a reminder of nature's artistry. In this fleeting calm, embrace the beauty of San Francisco, dressed accordingly for both the chill of evening and the warmth of the sun.
